Sonee Hardware Pvt Ltd, often referred to as simply Sonee Hardware, is a Maldivian company that operates in the hardware and construction materials sector. The company supplies a range of products including hardware, construction materials, electrical items, and power tools. It serves a diverse customer base comprising individuals, small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs), and larger corporations throughout the Maldives.
History
Established in the 1970's as a corner shop. A full-fledged hardware business with a loyal customer base and the reputation of being one of the country's largest, with 8 outlets in strategic locations around Male'.
By the mid-1990s, Sonee Hardware had expanded its product portfolio through the introduction of internationally recognized brands such as Bosch, Osram, and ABB.
In 2002, Sonee Hardware established a Bosch power tools service center to support its after-sales commitments.
Further expansion took place in 2009, with the launch of several new initiatives. These included the opening of Sonee Hardware Professional, a dedicated showroom for professional-grade products, and the introduction of SII-manufactured aggregates and sand.
Mission and Values
Sonee Hardware emphasizes customer service and product quality in its operations. The company aims to expand its imports of hardware products and strengthen its position in the local market as a supplier for both individual and corporate clients.
Their stated goals include becoming the preferred choice for customers and a reliable partner for suppliers. Internally, the company promotes a culture that prioritizes employee engagement, customer satisfaction, and ongoing operational improvement.
Showrooms & outlets
Sonee Hardware's widespread presence throughout Male' and Hulhumale' encompasses a network of diversified 8 retail outlets, providing convenient access to customers across the capital. Notable establishments include:
Sonee Main
Sonee Main is the flagship outlet of Sonee Hardware, located in Malé, Maldives. As the primary store, it carries the entire portfolio of hardware products offered by Sonee Hardware. Sonee Main is strategically placed on a well-known commercial hub dedicated to hardware and home improvement.
Sonee Home
Focused on providing a selection of functional and affordable home solutions, Sonee Home features a wide range of kitchen and home appliances, household products, and accessories.
Sonee Hardware Hulhumale'
This outlet is the largest operated by the company and spans three floors. Located in Hulhumalé, it offers an extensive selection of hardware and home improvement products.
Sonee Fishing
Opened on 10 December 2020, Sonee Fishing is a specialized retail outlet focusing on fishing equipment. The store carries a variety of products including reels, rods, lures, and accessories from international brands such as Shimano, Rapala, Mustad, Yamaga Blanks, and Williamson.
Sonee Hardware Vinares
In 2024, Sonee Hardware opened a new outlet at the Vinares apartment complex in Hulhumalé Phase II. The two-story store specializes in kitchen and bathroom fixtures, fittings, and tools. The expansion aims to improve accessibility for customers in this new urban area.
Corporate Affairs
Special events & promotions
Sonee Hardware periodically conducts promotional campaigns, including seasonal events such as Ramadan promotions, which may feature customer giveaways. Additionally, the company also maintains a distribution network of dealers and resellers throughout the Maldives, aiming to improve accessibility to its products across the islands.
Corporate social responsibility
Sonee Hardware engages in corporate social responsibility (CSR) initiatives that consider economic, social, and environmental factors. These efforts include sponsoring local sports clubs, supporting community infrastructure projects, and providing aid during emergencies.
Partnerships and collaborations
Sonee Hardware maintains partnerships with various suppliers, manufacturers, and industry organizations. The company also engages in collaborations with other businesses and associations within the hardware and construction sectors.
Awards and achievements
Sonee Hardware has received national recognition in the Maldives for its work over the years. They include the Public Service Excellence Award and the Outstanding Contribution to Business Award in 2002, highlighting its impact on the national business landscape. Additionally, in 2007, Sonee was awarded the Presidential GREEN LEAF Award for its exceptional contributions to environmental sustainability.
Advertising
Sonee Hardware's advertising campaigns have become notable within the Maldives for their creative use of humor, colloquial language, and cultural references. These campaigns are often designed to resonate with the everyday experiences of local audiences, using familiar phrases and situations to promote hardware products in an engaging manner.
Among its most recognized advertisements are "Cool Kuraa Fankaa" which promotes ceiling fans using a humorous take on staying cool in Maldivian weather, and "Mas Banas". These ads have been widely shared on social media and referenced in casual conversation, contributing to the brand's visibility and cultural relevance.
The company's signature jingle, "Mee Sonee Hardware Ey" (translated as "This is Sonee Hardware"), has become closely associated with the brand. Its melodic and repetitive style has made it easily recognizable. The jingle was later adapted and covered by prominent local musicians, further embedding the brand in the local pop culture landscape.
Through this approach, Sonee Hardware has established a marketing identity that blends commercial messaging with entertainment and cultural familiarity. This strategy has contributed to public awareness of the brand beyond its retail operations, reinforcing its presence in everyday life across the Maldives.
